event_description: Hosted this simple 4th of July party in my backyard. Its a simplistic style but was a hit among friends.

items.name: Drink Station
items.item_description: Red cool-aid in my drink dispenser and mason jar mugs. Decorated them with the red and blue starred paper straws.
items.link: Got the straws online from amazon

items.name: Tiered Stand
items.item_description: Already had the tiered stand. Used bottom two tiers to display cookies and mini cupcakes. On top tier just put a bunch of flags in a bag.
items.link: Got the mini flags from dollar tree

event_description: My small effort to decorate a corner table on 4th of July with the items found at home and some from dollar tree.

items.name: Small Banner
items.item_description: got this banner and then added red ribbons after each star and it enhanced its beauty.
items.link: Got the banner from dollar tree

items.name: Fruit Skewers
items.item_description: Got this small blue bin and added fruit skewers which were so easy to make with blueberries, strawberries and marshmellows.
items.link: Got the blue bucket from dollar tree

items.name: USA
items.item_description: Just painted these USA letters and added glitter to the U and A

event_description: This was a very basic decor for my family. We loved the 4th of July vibes while enjoying our meal.

items.name: Balloons
items.item_description: Saw a tutorial online of how to make this balloons arch and to my surprise it wasn't even too tough.
items.link: Got the balloons online from amazon

items.name: USA & Stars
items.item_description: Got the USA and star blocks and just glued on the crafts paper that I already had lying around the house.
items.link: Got the USA and star blocks from a local thrift store.

event_description: Our 10th Anniversary was a special one. Decorated our breakfast nook and it was amazing.

items.name: Balloons
items.item_description: Got hellium filled red balloons and just let them float above the breakfast nook.

items.name: Number 10 Balloons
items.item_description: Got the helium filled number 1 and number 0 balloons.
items.link: Got the number balloons from party city.

items.name: Rose Petals Path
items.item_description: Layed some rose petals on the floor in the shape of a pathway to the table.

event_description: This was a surprise decoration by our kids. We loved it.

items.name: Happy Anniversary Balloons
items.item_description: Got Happy Anniversary balloons and used them as a banner on our living room wall.
items.link: Got the balloons online from amazon

items.name: Floating balloons
items.item_description: Got the helium filled pink and silver balloons and let them float.

items.name: Balloons
items.item_description: Covered the whole living room floor with the balloons.

event_description: Our 50th Anniversary. WOW we made it!!! Golden!!!

items.name: 50 Balloons
items.item_description: Got the number 5 and 0 balloons and stuck them on the wall.
items.link: Got the number balloons online from amazon

items.name: Chalkboard Sign
items.item_description: Found a chalkboard sign and it was a perfect display.
items.link: Luckily got it from dollar store.

items.name: Balloon Arch
items.item_description: Tried making the white and gold balloon arch. Wasn't perfect but worth the try.

event_description: 50th Anniversary. Big one. A simple corner table with 50 pictures down the memory lane. One from each year.

items.name: 50 Pictures
items.item_description: Chose one pic from each year we are married and made the number 50 using them.

items.name: Number 50 on a Padestal
items.item_description: Displayed the golden number 50 on a black padestal

items.name: Flowers on a Padestal
items.item_description: Displayed small flowers on two black padestals.

event_description: My sister threw me a baby shower and this was the perfect decor.

items.name: Wrapped Gift Boxes
items.item_description: She used the empty boxes of different sizes and wrapped them in the brown wrapping paper and then tied the ribbons on them. Also cut out 'BABY' and pasted on them.

items.name: Raining Cloud
items.item_description: My sister is very artistic and she made this cloud using a white crafts paper and then stringed the raindrop cutouts and it was beautiful.
items.link: She got the white crafts paper from micheals.

event_description: My friend threw me this baby shower and it was amazing.

items.name: Backdrop Rings
items.item_description: Got the rings and wrapped the middle ring with the leaves garland and then added some flowers to it. For the side rings, just added some flowers.
items.link: Got the rings from amazon and the garland and flowers from dollar store.

items.name: Name Boxes
items.item_description: Added the letters in the small boxes and displayed them on a wooden crate
items.link: Got the small boxes from dollar store.

items.name: Small Tent
items.item_description: Gathered 3 sticka and tied  them together and then wrapped a white sheet so it looks like a small tent.
items.link: Got the sheet from dollar store.

items.name: Chocolate Covered Breadsticks
items.item_description: DIYed these chocolate covered breadsticks and then sprinkled chopped up nuts on them. So divine.
items.link: Got all the ingredients from safeway.

event_description: I hosted and put together my friend's baby shower. I made everything myself and it was so much fun.

items.name: Banner and Paper Fans
items.item_description: Got both premade. Added letters on the banner myself by cutting the crafs paper.

items.name: Games Corner
items.item_description: Got the clear wooden blocks and everyone drew abc on them for the baby. Letter H was for guest sign ins for baby H
items.link: Got the wooden blocks and letter H from micheals.

items.name: Photo Backdrop
items.item_description: Made the backdrop by cutting the crape paper and gluing it to a dtring. Decorated with paper lanterns and balloons.
items.link: Got the crape paper from dollar store and the paper lanterns from amazon.

items.name: Homemade Peach Preserve
items.item_description: This was the baby shower favor. Homemade peach preserve. Got the recipe online.

items.name: Food Table
items.item_description: The wall decor is just some streamers, balloons, and a string of pom poms. For drinks used empty coconut drink bottles.
items.link: Streamers and pompoms from amazon. Balloons from safeway.

event_description: It was my friend's first baby and I loved hosting a baby shower for her and totally enjoyed it.

items.name: Cake Table
items.item_description: Homemade peach cheesecake cups. Handmade cake topper garland using crafts paper and paper straws.

items.name: Food Table
items.item_description: Empty boxes wrapped up and decorated as gifts. Wall decorated wyth pompoms and balloons. Empty jam jars used as glasses for the drink.

items.name: Cake Back Wall
items.item_description: Peach paper fans, banner with DIYed letters in it and balloons.
items.link: Banner and paper fans from amazon, balloons from safeway.

items.name: Games & Guest Notes
items.item_description: Some baby shower games like don't say word 'baby' & DIYed guest notes on cards and then hung on the photo frame using the tiny clothespin.

items.name: Party Favors
items.item_description: DIYed rose petal lotion bars as party favors for the guests. Displayed on the dries rose petals in a tray.

items.name: Photo Booth
items.item_description: DIYed the whole photo booth props. Just freehand drawings and then cutouts and stuch them to sticks. The frame was also DIYed.
items.link: The Frame was cut out using a chart paper.

event_description: This was my daughter's 1st birthday and I was super excited to organise the best birthday party ever. Penguin was her favorite plush toy back then so I made everything around penguins.

items.name: Banner and Penguin Cutouts
items.item_description: Made the Birthday banner using yellow paper plates. Penguin cutouts were the hardest as I had to freehand draw them and then color them and cut them out.
items.link: Plates and cardstock paper for penguins from Dollar Tree

items.name: Balloon Flowers
items.item_description: Tied 4 big same color balloons together and then a smaller different color balloon in the middle.

items.name: Candy Jars
items.item_description: Decorated rock candy and gum balls in clear jars.

items.name: Cutlery & Napkins
items.item_description: Got yellow and silver plates and folded t he napkins and placed a spoon in each. Also put a penguin sticker on there.
items.link: All cutlery and napkins from Dollar Tree

items.name: Party Favors
items.item_description: Tied small helium balloons to each party favor box.
items.link: Party favor boxes and balloons from amazon

event_description: My 1st born's 1st birthday and honey is her nickname. So it had to be a yellow black honey bee.

items.name: Banner, Bees and Honeycombs
items.item_description: Used cardstock to make everything. Freehand drew the bees and cut them out.

items.name: Bee Balloons
items.item_description: Filled in the yellow balloons and painted black stripes on them. Made eyes and smile with a sharpie and cut out white wings and stuck them on sides.

items.name: Table Decor
items.item_description: Found the picture frame, bee teapot and the bee on a flower for decor. That was just perfect.
items.link: Found everyrhing at a thrift store

items.name: More Table Decor
items.item_description: Filled the clear vase with my daughter's yellow balls. The rest I just gatheres yellow stuff from around the house.

event_description: My princess turned 4 and wanted an icecream birthday party. So mommy pulled all her tricks and made it happen.

items.name: Hanging Icecream Cones
items.item_description: Rolled up brown paper to make a cone and then crumpled some gift paper and taped it in so it looks loke icecream.

items.name: Candies
items.item_description: Took a paper plate and wrapped a gift paper all around it and then twisted the sides and wrapped a ribbon at both ends.
items.link: Wrapping paper and plated from dollar store

items.name: Lollipop Candies
items.item_description: Got a floral foam block and wrapped it up in a paper. Then arranged the lollipops on it.
items.link: Floral foam block from dollar store

event_description: My 4 year old is obsessed with flowers these days. So did not have any choice but to have flower themed birthday for her.

items.name: Balloon Arch
items.item_description: DIYed the balloon arch and it was a success.

items.name: Pudding Cups
items.item_description: Made individual serving pudding cups and added the edible flower as decor. Placed them on a wooden crate.

items.name: Flower Headbands & Balloons
items.item_description: Tied 4 heart flowers and one small roud flower in the middle. Got the flower headbands for all the girls.

items.name: Favors & Decor
items.item_description: Found the flowers online and just decorated the party favor table with small balloons.
items.link: Balloons and the flowers from amazon.

event_description: Harry Potter themed birthday for my friend who is a Harry Potter die heart fan.

items.name: Balloon Arch
items.item_description: Made balloon arch with 4 different colored balloons.

items.name: Hogwart's Decor
items.item_description: Found some awesome stuff that was perfect for Harry Potter themed decor.
items.link: Found all from my local thrift store.

items.name: Hogwarts Express
items.item_description: Found the Hogwarts Express and golden icecream bowl that went perfect with the theme.
items.link: Both things from my local thrift store.

event_description: For my friend's 36th birthday, we threw them an elegant birthday party which they loved.

items.name: Cakepops
items.item_description: Upside down cakepops were a hit. decorated them on a glass vintage box which was jyst perfect.

event_description: Space themed birthday bash for my 6 year old, He wants to become an astronaut one day.

items.name: Astronaut Balloon
items.item_description: One of the main decor was the astronaut balloon.

items.name: Planets Balloon Arch
items.item_description: Made a balloons arch with planets themed balloons

items.name: Space Themed Plates & Favor Bags
items.item_description: Got all the plates and cutlery and favor bags space themed.

event_description: Bridal shower for my sister. Pink is her forever favorite color.

items.name: Balloon Arch
items.item_description: Got balloons in different shapes and sizes and made them into an arch and then stuck some leaves on it.

items.name: Bride to Be Stuff
items.item_description: Got ready made 'Bride to Be' stuff like favor bags, napkins, plates and glasses.

items.name: Champagne Glass Stand
items.item_description: This was such a nice addition to the decor. Everyone loved it.

event_description: My bridal shower was a hit. My friends all arranged such a nice one. We enjoyed everthing.

items.name: Balloon Arch $ Champagne Bottle
items.item_description: They got the champagne bottle balloon and made the balloons arch themselves mimicking the bubbles..

items.name: Food Decore
items.item_description: They decorated the food so awesomely by using a wood crate for height.

event_description: My best friend's bridal shower. All of us friends got toether to put up this little display before her big day.

items.name: Balloon Arch
items.item_description: Got balloons in different colors and made an arch.

items.name: Favor Boxes
items.item_description: Got the avor boxes which were easy to put together and then decorated them on my golden vintage tray.

items.name: Pretzels in a Jar
items.item_description: Got these white chocolate covered pretzels and displayed them in a clear jar

event_description: A mimimalist bridal shower as desired by the bride herself. Even this much was amazing for her.

items.name: Pompom Banner
items.item_description: Made the pompom banner by just stringing together the pompoms.

items.name: 'She Said Yes' Sign
items.item_description: Got this wooden board and just painted 'She said Yes' on it.

items.name: Mini Wooden Crates
items.item_description: Got these wooden crates and filled them with white chocolate covered pretzels and berries.

event_description: My daughhter's graduation party. She and her friends enjoyed  this so much.

items.name: Grad Themed Stuff
items.item_description: The banner and all the decor was bought premade.

items.name: Cutlery & Flatware
items.item_description: Everything cutlery and flatware was purchased themed

items.name: Water Bottles
items.item_description: I covered the water bottles with pink paper and they looked so fancy.

event_description: My daughhter's graduation party. She and her friends enjoyed  this so much.

items.name: Paper Fans
items.item_description: These were a purchase made online and easy to put on.

items.name: Banner
items.item_description: Banner was also purchased online.

event_description: Halloween is an occassion everyone in our house is keen to celebrate, be it a kid or an adult.

items.name: Balloon Arch
items.item_description: DIYed the balloon arch and covered it with web. SPOOKY!

items.name: Paper Bats
items.item_description: Made paper bats some big for decor and some small for cake decor.

items.name: Pompom Garland
items.item_description: Stringed the pompoms for table decor.

items.name: Candy
items.item_description: Decorated the table by putting gum balls and candy canes in clear jars.
items.link: Jars and candies from party city.

event_description: Elegant minimal halloween decor. A corner table.

items.name: Paper Bats
items.item_description: Made paper bats by freehand drawing them first and then cutting them out.

items.name: Paper Bats on Tree
items.item_description: Made mini paper bats and stuck them on my long twig decore, emulating a tree full of bats.

items.name: Insect Wall Decor
items.item_description: I already had these wall hangings and they went well with the halloween decor.

items.name: Treats on Padestel
items.item_description: Displayed treats in a jar on a small black padestal.
items.link: Empty yogurt jars. Black padestal from Target.

event_description: Halloween Table decor for a small party at my house. We all dressed up and had fun.

items.name: Banner
items.item_description: Made the banner myself by cutting out and pasting the letters and then stringing them all together

items.name: Flatware and Decor
items.item_description: Got all these plates, glasses, pumpkins premade.

items.name: Paper Fans
items.item_description: These paper fans were purchased online.

event_description: A mini feast with halloween decor. Snacks table spookified.

items.name: Balloon Arch
items.item_description: DIYed the balloon arch using balloons of different sizes and colors.

items.name: Drinkware
items.item_description: Added ribbon bows to the empty soda bottles and added paper straws in them.

items.name: Hanging Paper Fans
items.item_description: These paper fans were purchased online.

event_description: In summer, all my friends want to gather at my pool to cool off. This is my go to pool decor.

items.name: Balloons
items.item_description: Scatterred balloond in the pool look so cool and take no effort at all.

items.name: Balloon Posts
items.item_description: I have posts around my pool and I add bid sized balloons on top.

items.name: Pool Drik Floats
items.item_description: This was my best purchase ever. they look cute while holding everyones drinks in the pool.

event_description: This is my pool party side decor. Basically a wecome booth for my guests to get drinks.

items.name: Balloon Arch
items.item_description: Made the balloon arch from different shades of pink balloons and then added some leaves in between.

items.name: Lemonade Stand
items.item_description: I used my side table outside to hold the lemonade jars and act as a center piece for the arched balloons.

event_description: The food table beside my pool. This was the main pool party decor area.

items.name: ALOHA Balloons
items.item_description: These balloons were purchased prefilled.

items.name: Lemonade Stand
items.item_description: This lemonade dispenser was the best buy I ever got. It was very cheap yet elegant

items.name: Beach Balls
items.item_description: Inflated some beach balls  and used them as my decor.

items.name: Jello Stand
items.item_description: Dot this padestal stand and decorated jello shots on top.

items.name: Leaves & Flower Petals
items.item_description: Used these leaves as my table spread and added flower petals as confetti on them.

event_description: Added this little corner at the entrance of my brother's wedding. Everyone loved it.

items.name: Welcome Easel
items.item_description: I paint as a hobby so already had the easel. just added the Welcome sign on the easel.

items.name: Wooden Crates
items.item_description: Had all these in my house as well. The wooden crates, flower vases and lantern. Just arranged them as such.
items.link: Lantern from amazon & Crates from micheals.

event_description: Simplistic beach wedding. Lovely weather to accompany the lovely ceremony.

items.name: Chair Tags
items.item_description: Got these chalkboard tags and wrote some nice quotes and hung them on isle chairs.

items.name: Bamboo Arch
items.item_description: Got 3 bamboo posts and made an arch. Then tied white sheets around the bamboo.

event_description: Desserts table set up for an outdoor wedding of my best friend.

items.name: Chair Tags
items.item_description: Got these tags and wrote 'Mr' & 'Mrs' and hung them on the chairs.

items.name: Barrel Table
items.item_description: Got these barrels and added the wood plank on top and voila. A table!!
items.link: Barrels from a friend & wood plank from home depot

items.name: Dessert Stands
items.item_description: Collected some dessert stands and used them to display different desserts.
